audioText: Elle voudra sûrement participer au voyage scolaire en Normandie.
question: What will she probably want to do?
options: She will surely want to participate in the school trip to Normandy
She will surely want to participate in the school trip to Brittany
She will surely want to organize the school trip to Normandy
She will surely want to cancel the school trip to Normandy
explanation: The speaker said 'Elle voudra sûrement participer au voyage scolaire en Normandie' - She will surely want to participate in the school trip to Normandy. 'Voudra' is the future tense of 'vouloir' (to want).
